latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Not Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to conduct business and employment reference checks of staff/volunteers
Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that individual associated with child care service/camp involved in an act detrimental to health and safety
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hallways and other means of egress were observed obstructed and impassable
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was observed in the child care service that a bathroom/closet or other enclosed space has a locking mechanism solely operable from inside the space
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
Adequate lighting not provided in food prep area at time of inspection Foods observed not protected from contamination from light fixture/bulb damage at time of inspection
